##Living in a chat room

Micro-signal. Meirirenwu

Functional Introduction, light business, understand life.

The forehead warm gun in epidemic draught, worth several times in a hurry. In the case of insufficient supply, cheater, "Flip" , and "retail" , several up and down constitute a seemingly tense prosperity of the trading chain, but, each entrant can not get away with it.


By Wang Wenqing

Editor | Zhong XV, Xiao Zhu
Run | mountain

Business Opportunities

Uh, warm guns have never been in such demand.

Originally in Tianjin to do Software Development Sun Fei found that his circle of friends, someone is selling the amount of warm guns, with a "spot" "scarce" word. A few months ago, his colleagues bought one on a shopping website for just $68, but the cheap erwen gun is nowhere to be found today, with a price tag of 700 yuan in friends'circles, up nearly 10 fold.

After the outbreak, the body temperature test has become an important threshold to identify suspected patients. The medical grade frontal temperature gun does not need to touch, the time is short, relies on the infrared survey, on the forehead is a flash, therefore becomes the public place body temperature examination first choice. With the acceleration of the pace of resumption of work, the demand for Ewen Gun is also growing.

A "Gun" hard to find, Sun Fei from the smell of "business opportunities.

The recent 90-day forehead temperature gun search index changes, from the end of January outbreak of a rapid rise. Figure / Baidu Index

On the afternoon of Feb. 9, he met Tai Ling Online, who, in addition to selling Hazmat suits, had a stock of warm guns. They agreement, Sun Fei to 278 unit price to buy 1000 units, 10% down payment, get express delivery receipt to pay the full amount.

"At that time I wanted to buy some and sell it, because I wasn't worried about selling it, " Sun Fei said. Not Without suspicion, but the seller provided his own ID, and he let his guard down. Originally about the same night delivery, but not long, the seller said that other customers to pay the full amount of 10,000 sets of warm guns, tight supply, asked Sun Fei to pay a 50% deposit. After Sun Fei borrows money, 50% is no longer OK, want full money. "Then I calmed down and thought, that chat is like deliberately creating a very tense atmosphere. " Sun Fei said.

In his haste, he rounded up nearly $280,000 and waited for delivery.

Wu Zhe in Dongguan, Guangdong, has done more. On February 14, he met Qian Yu, who said he had an employer, surnamed Tian. Lao Tian has connections in the factory, can get the goods, after paying the full amount, the 18th to the 20th can be shipped. Two days later, at Wu's request, Qian showed him his contract with Tian.

"I also suspected at the time, because it wasn't on the Internet, how could he have it there? But Qian Yu said don't worry, you can have all your ID cards and you can also have video verification, " Wu Zhe recalled, "I just believed him because his ID card and bank card and Alipay were all given to me [ to see ] and the verification was real. "

Wu Zhe didn't think much of it. The 33-year-old, who had been working for Foxconn in Zhengzhou, moved to Dongguan two years ago to work in a shoe factory as a buyer. He had an idea when he saw someone selling the guns. "The guns are usually used in factories to get them. I can earn some money for milk powder myself, because my child is only one and a half years old. "

After he heard that the last family had the goods, he released the news of the future value of the warm gun in the group. Subsequently, someone added his friend. After showing two contracts, two people from the next family each made their own contributions. One bought 900 sets at the price of 335 yuan, another to 340 yuan to buy 1000 sets, 641500 yuan money to Wu zhe account, he and the agreed price is 320 yuan, two down, can profit 33,500 yuan.

The next few days, Wu Zhe thought, just need to wait for the amount of warm gun and "hard fee" together to come, during the epidemic period is perturbed, but also have hope.

As a necessary product for enterprises to resume work, even if the price all the way up, ewen gun is still "hard to get a shot. ". Image / network

Run away

On the network, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe these turn the hand amount warm gun to earn the price difference person, is called collectively "the inverted ye" . The etymology is derogatory, but for those of you who have been there, this is an opportunity.

In Dongguan, Wu Zhe earns 5,000 yuan a month, lives with his wife and children, and, apart from the five dangers, one gold, food and rent, just enough to cover expenses and save a little on occasion, while a 75 year old mother remains in Henan Province in need of care. He's looking forward to making over $30,000 to ease the stress of his life. Sun Fei, who works in Tianjin, is stuck in his hometown of Foshan in Guangdong province because of the disease. He hopes to make up the shortfall with the money.

But things didn't turn out the way they'd hoped. Sun Fei's nearly 280,000 transferred out, delayed to wait for delivery. The day after the agreed delivery date, Sun Feiyue think more wrong, chasing for inspection video. At 11:00 that night, the seller said they couldn't deliver, and the manufacturer was out of stock. "That does not want goods, refund. " Sun Fei asks, the other side also does not agree. Only then did he realize that he might have been deceived.

Wu Zhe participates in the trading chain to be longer, the loss is also more. To the agreed time of delivery, the supplier has not given him a courier slip number. Around 6:00 p.m. , the dealer said he was duped, and he was gonNA call the cops. Wu Zhe panic, also went to the police station. In the police station, he saw his next Mr. Stone, let him not think of is, the next under more than ten next home.

During the outbreak, the woman spent more than 40,000 yuan ordering a thermometer was deceived. Check out the news

After a long time to explain and discuss, at 5 am, Wu Zhe finally returned home, the child has gone to bed. He and his wife hold head to weep bitterly, "I think I this family finished, what about the children, I went to jail, what about the wife, what about the mother at home. "

Calm down, he thought the next day to ask the next must pay money, or go to work to find him. He was afraid that someone would make trouble for his wife. At about 6 o'clock in the morning, he set off again to the public security bureau and pleaded with the police to lock him up.

"No car, I'll walk. On the way to see the motorcycle soliciting, I asked him to take me to the Public Security Bureau. I went there, the guard said you should go to the police station, I said I went last night, now can I ask you to let me in to tell the situation to Interpol again. The guard said it had to go up one level at a time."

"Pass" in vain, he went to the bus platform, when 8:00, the next call, said he had to his work in the factory, Wu Zhe in 10:00 to get 50,000 out. He borrowed money from a friend. After the next family received it, he was asked to pay back the money in one day. "You can borrow money online if you don't have it. "

Wu Zhe was afraid, both afraid of meeting with the next conflict, but also afraid of being forced to borrow online. He climbed to the top of the factory, on the 6th floor, sent a message to his friends. The sudden pressure broke him, and he decided to commit suicide by jumping off the building.

Fortunately, his family stopped him in time, and he did not take this road. "My wife said that if it happened, she would wait for me even if I were in prison. " To be safe, Wu Zhe quit his job and took his wife away from the factory to live with relatives, "a life of flight. "

Indict

February 21, Wu Zhe's home to get a filing notice, the police informed that the swindler has fled abroad.

Said the amount of warm gun became empty promises, on the home or Wu Zhe, how also can not collect hundreds of thousands. The last told Wu Zhe, next, he works every month, if the salary has 5,000, he will return 4,000, if have 4,000 to 3,000. Wu Zhe with his two underlings negotiations, will be the upper house to earn money equally to them, the next do not agree, said will look for debt collection companies, will be prepared to sue.

Although in the view of Yan Shuangjin, a lawyer with Fujian Youtong Law Firm, Wu Zhe's conduct was not suspected of fraud: he was unable to deliver goods to the next home on time, and it was the performance of the first-hand seller, Tian Mou, that did not result in Wu Zhe's intention of illegally possessing the next home's money, but at this time Wu Zhe because the pressure is too big, sleep not well, the meal also can not eat. "Regret Ah, also lost the job. "

Sun Fei has also decided to sue.

Only the day before he reported the crime, Tai Ling first went to the police station to report the crime, said Sun Fei Suspected of fraud and money laundering. This complicates the case and requires a 30-day adjournment. During the month, he received phone calls from Tai Ling's husband and friends, one claiming to be a lawyer and the other claiming to be a debt collector, who kindly advised Sun Fei: "each take a step back, half the money back here, and you can buy a lesson. "

By contrast, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe is not so much known as the "down-and-out" as the "retail" , their experience is not unique. As of February 14, China had cracked 3,600 cases of fraud related to the epidemic and arrested 1,373 suspects with a total amount of 66.91 million yuan, according to official figures from the Ministry of Public Security. Those involved in the warm gun scam are also included.

In addition to the thousands of units ordered by Sun Fei and Wu Zhe, there are also many people who order a small amount of warm guns for the purpose of returning to work in factories and donating anti-epidemic materials. They are the underlings of the "inverted GRANDPA" and the "retail investors" .

Fang Zhiyuan is a native of Tongling, Anhui Province. On February 11, he was introduced by a friend to Chan Mou, who claimed to have a warm gun for delivery. Fang Zhiyuan needs a warming gun for his factory to resume work. In addition, there are also six or seven checkpoints in his hometown village for body temperature testing. He wants to donate some materials. In the early morning of the same day, he bought 77 warming guns from Chen somewhere, totaling 15,400 yuan, and arranged for delivery in the morning.

Invoice No. As promised, Chen said no spot, need to wait another eight or nine days. Fang Zhiyuan can not wait, ask to return money, be rejected however. In the chat, Chen repeatedly threatened, "you asked me to help sell you, no one tied you, you buy, you transfer money. " This let Fang Zhiyuan very do not understand, do business, "no diamond do not work. "

The day before Fang's transfer, Wang Juan in Beijing was helping two friends buy a batch of warm guns. After docking with the seller, the other side first promised to find goods the same day, and then changed their mouth, said only the industrial amount temperature gun, can also be used to measure body temperature, as soon as possible to get the source of payment. As an industrial temperature gun, it is generally believed that the error is larger without professional debugging.

Desperate for money, Wang Juan bought 131 warm guns at a unit price of 322 and transferred more than 40,000 in installments. Only in the end, she received the express order number is empty, when the request for a refund was also rejected.

Demand

After the event, Sun Fei contacted a friend who had been in contact with the production of the Erwen gun and concluded, "now anyone who says they have more than 500(Erwen) guns in their hands is a liar and should not be trusted. "

The current scalping, is basically pre-received payment, and then through various channels to find goods, "even many are fraudulent money, " the thermometer supplier Jiuan Medical Chairman Liu Yi said. The first person to release the spot information, will through the nth power fission method, the accumulation of large amounts of money and needs, and finally because of the hands of no goods, has been delayed delivery date.

Liu thinks it is impossible for some merchants to claim they have tens of thousands of them in stock. Last year, less than 2 million units were sold, he said, and the country now needs 10 million units a month for public health and epidemic prevention. "The capacity of all the manufacturers in the market is now used for the government's public health needs and is basically zero inventory. "

The medical grade forehead warm gun belongs to the second class medical instrument, the production enterprise must have the medical instrument production license qualification. Today, for companies, the main difficulty in expanding production capacity comes from the pressure of the supply chain: The production of Ewen Gun involves more than 100 raw materials, affected by the epidemic, and now suppliers are short of materials, upstream raw material enterprises also have to face the embarrassment of insufficient capacity.

More importantly, for the production enterprises, commercial needs have been put on hold, to make every effort to safeguard public health needs first, especially the needs of Hubei epidemic areas.

The current epidemic, many medical enterprises to speed up the resumption of production of warm guns and other medical supplies. Photo / Jiuan medical's official Weibo

The forehead warm gun in epidemic draught, worth several times in a hurry. In the case of insufficient supply, cheater, "Flip" , and "retail" , several up and down constitute a seemingly tense prosperity of the trading chain, but, each entrant can not get away with it.

By April, Liu expects further capacity to be freed up as thermometer makers ramp up production. If there is no major change in the epidemic, the amount of thermometer in the domestic supply and demand may be balanced.

Before the end of the epidemic, the words "Ewen Gun! Spot! " "50,000 from order! " Continued to appear in the seller's circle of friends.

(at the request of the interviewees, Sun Fei, Tai Ling, Wu Zhe, Qian Yu, Fang Zhiyuan and Wang Juan were given pseudonyms.)

Everyone interacted
Do you have anyone selling warm guns?

The article was originally created for the daily characters

This article is exclusively for tencent news and can not be reproduced without permission

The forehead warm gun in epidemic draught, worth several times in a hurry. In the case of insufficient supply, cheater, "Flip" , and "retail" , several up and down constitute a seemingly tense prosperity of the trading chain, but, each entrant can not get away with it.

By Wang Wenqing

Editor | Zhong XV, Xiao Zhu

Run | mountain

Business Opportunities

Uh, warm guns have never been in such demand.

Originally in Tianjin to do Software Development Sun Fei found that his circle of friends, someone is selling the amount of warm guns, with a "spot" "scarce" word. A few months ago, his colleagues bought one on a shopping website for just $68, but the cheap erwen gun is nowhere to be found today, with a price tag of 700 yuan in friends'circles, up nearly 10 fold.

After the outbreak, the body temperature test has become an important threshold to identify suspected patients. The medical grade frontal temperature gun does not need to touch, the time is short, relies on the infrared survey, on the forehead is a flash, therefore becomes the public place body temperature examination first choice. With the acceleration of the pace of resumption of work, the demand for Ewen Gun is also growing.

A "Gun" hard to find, Sun Fei from the smell of "business opportunities.

The recent 90-day forehead temperature gun search index changes, from the end of January outbreak of a rapid rise. Figure / Baidu Index

On the afternoon of Feb. 9, he met Tai Ling Online, who, in addition to selling Hazmat suits, had a stock of warm guns. They agreement, Sun Fei to 278 unit price to buy 1000 units, 10% down payment, get express delivery receipt to pay the full amount.

"At that time I wanted to buy some and sell it, because I wasn't worried about selling it, " Sun Fei said. Not Without suspicion, but the seller provided his own ID, and he let his guard down. After Sun Fei borrows money, 50% is no longer OK, want full money. "Then I calmed down and thought, that chat is like deliberately creating a very tense atmosphere. " Sun Fei said.

In his haste, he rounded up nearly $280,000 and waited for delivery.

Wu Zhe in Dongguan, Guangdong, has done more. On February 14, he met Qian Yu, who said he had an employer, surnamed Tian. Lao Tian has connections in the factory, can get the goods, after paying the full amount, the 18th to the 20th can be shipped. Two days later, at Wu's request, Qian showed him his contract with Tian.

"I also suspected at the time, because it wasn't on the Internet, how could he have it there? But Qian Yu said don't worry, you can have all your ID cards and you can also have video verification, " Wu Zhe recalled, "I just believed him because his ID card and bank card and Alipay were all given to me [ to see ] and the verification was real. "

Wu Zhe didn't think much of it. The 33-year-old, who had been working for Foxconn in Zhengzhou, moved to Dongguan two years ago to work in a shoe factory as a buyer. He had an idea when he saw someone selling the guns. "The guns are usually used in factories to get them. I can earn some money for milk powder myself, because my child is only one and a half years old. "

After he heard that the last family had the goods, he released the news of the future value of the warm gun in the group. Subsequently, someone added his friend. After showing two contracts, two people from the next family each made their own contributions. One bought 900 sets at the price of 335 yuan, another to 340 yuan to buy 1000 sets, 641500 yuan money to Wu zhe account, he and the agreed price is 320 yuan, two down, can profit 33,500 yuan.

A few months ago, his colleagues bought one on a shopping website for just $68, but the cheap erwen gun is nowhere to be found today, with a price tag of 700 yuan in friends'circles, up nearly 10 fold.

After the outbreak, the body temperature test has become an important threshold to identify suspected patients. The medical grade frontal temperature gun does not need to touch, the time is short, relies on the infrared survey, on the forehead is a flash, therefore becomes the public place body temperature examination first choice. With the acceleration of the pace of resumption of work, the demand for Ewen Gun is also growing.

A "Gun" hard to find, Sun Fei from the smell of "business opportunities.

The recent 90-day forehead temperature gun search index changes, from the end of January outbreak of a rapid rise. Figure / Baidu Index

On the afternoon of Feb. 9, he met Tai Ling Online, who, in addition to selling Hazmat suits, had a stock of warm guns. They agreement, Sun Fei to 278 unit price to buy 1000 units, 10% down payment, get express delivery receipt to pay the full amount.

"At that time I wanted to buy some and sell it, because I wasn't worried about selling it, " Sun Fei said. Not Without suspicion, but the seller provided his own ID, and he let his guard down. Originally about the same night delivery, but not long, the seller said that other customers to pay the full amount of 10,000 sets of warm guns, tight supply, asked Sun Fei to pay a 50% deposit. After Sun Fei borrows money, 50% is no longer OK, want full money. "Then I calmed down and thought, that chat is like deliberately creating a very tense atmosphere. " Sun Fei said.

In his haste, he rounded up nearly $280,000 and waited for delivery.

Wu Zhe in Dongguan, Guangdong, has done more. On February 14, he met Qian Yu, who said he had an employer, surnamed Tian. Lao Tian has connections in the factory, can get the goods, after paying the full amount, the 18th to the 20th can be shipped. Two days later, at Wu's request, Qian showed him his contract with Tian.

"I also suspected at the time, because it wasn't on the Internet, how could he have it there? But Qian Yu said don't worry, you can have all your ID cards and you can also have video verification, " Wu Zhe recalled, "I just believed him because his ID card and bank card and Alipay were all given to me [ to see ] and the verification was real. "

Wu Zhe didn't think much of it. The 33-year-old, who had been working for Foxconn in Zhengzhou, moved to Dongguan two years ago to work in a shoe factory as a buyer. He had an idea when he saw someone selling the guns. "The guns are usually used in factories to get them. I can earn some money for milk powder myself, because my child is only one and a half years old. "

After he heard that the last family had the goods, he released the news of the future value of the warm gun in the group. Subsequently, someone added his friend. After showing two contracts, two people from the next family each made their own contributions. One bought 900 sets at the price of 335 yuan, another to 340 yuan to buy 1000 sets, 641500 yuan money to Wu zhe account, he and the agreed price is 320 yuan, two down, can profit 33,500 yuan.

The next few days, Wu Zhe thought, just need to wait for the amount of warm gun and "hard fee" together to come, during the epidemic period is perturbed, but also have hope.

As a necessary product for enterprises to resume work, even if the price all the way up, ewen gun is still "hard to get a shot. ". Image / network

Run away

On the network, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe these turn the hand amount warm gun to earn the price difference person, is called collectively "the inverted ye" . The etymology is derogatory, but for those of you who have been there, this is an opportunity.

In Dongguan, Wu Zhe earns 5,000 yuan a month, lives with his wife and children, and, apart from the five dangers, one gold, food and rent, just enough to cover expenses and save a little on occasion, while a 75 year old mother remains in Henan Province in need of care. He's looking forward to making over $30,000 to ease the stress of his life. Sun Fei, who works in Tianjin, is stuck in his hometown of Foshan in Guangdong province because of the disease. He hopes to make up the shortfall with the money.

But things didn't turn out the way they'd hoped. Sun Fei's nearly 280,000 transferred out, delayed to wait for delivery. The day after the agreed delivery date, Sun Feiyue think more wrong, chasing for inspection video. At 11:00 that night, the seller said they couldn't deliver, and the manufacturer was out of stock. "That does not want goods, refund. " Sun Fei asks, the other side also does not agree. Only then did he realize that he might have been deceived.

Wu Zhe participates in the trading chain to be longer, the loss is also more. To the agreed time of delivery, the supplier has not given him a courier slip number. Around 6:00 p.m. , the dealer said he was duped, and he was gonNA call the cops. Wu Zhe panic, also went to the police station. In the police station, he saw his next Mr. Stone, let him not think of is, the next under more than ten next home.

During the outbreak, the woman spent more than 40,000 yuan ordering a thermometer was deceived. Check out the news

After a long time to explain and discuss, at 5 am, Wu Zhe finally returned home, the child has gone to bed. He and his wife hold head to weep bitterly, "I think I this family finished, what about the children, I went to jail, what about the wife, what about the mother at home. "

Calm down, he thought the next day to ask the next must pay money, or go to work to find him. He was afraid that someone would make trouble for his wife. At about 6 o'clock in the morning, he set off again to the public security bureau and pleaded with the police to lock him up.

"No car, I'll walk. On the way to see the motorcycle soliciting, I asked him to take me to the Public Security Bureau. I went there, the guard said you should go to the police station, I said I went last night, now can I ask you to let me in to tell the situation to Interpol again. The guard said it had to go up one level at a time."

"Pass" in vain, he went to the bus platform, when 8:00, the next call, said he had to his work in the factory, Wu Zhe in 10:00 to get 50,000 out. He borrowed money from a friend. After the next family received it, he was asked to pay back the money in one day. "You can borrow money online if you don't have it. "

Wu Zhe was afraid, both afraid of meeting with the next conflict, but also afraid of being forced to borrow online. He climbed to the top of the factory, on the 6th floor, sent a message to his friends. The sudden pressure broke him, and he decided to commit suicide by jumping off the building.

Fortunately, his family stopped him in time, and he did not take this road. "My wife said that if it happened, she would wait for me even if I were in prison. " To be safe, Wu Zhe quit his job and took his wife away from the factory to live with relatives, "a life of flight. "

On the network, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe these turn the hand amount warm gun to earn the price difference person, is called collectively "the inverted ye" . The etymology is derogatory, but for those of you who have been there, this is an opportunity.

In Dongguan, Wu Zhe earns 5,000 yuan a month, lives with his wife and children, and, apart from the five dangers, one gold, food and rent, just enough to cover expenses and save a little on occasion, while a 75 year old mother remains in Henan Province in need of care. During the outbreak, the woman spent more than 40,000 yuan ordering a thermometer was deceived. Check out the news

After a long time to explain and discuss, at 5 am, Wu Zhe finally returned home, the child has gone to bed. He and his wife hold head to weep bitterly, "I think I this family finished, what about the children, I went to jail, what about the wife, what about the mother at home. "

Calm down, he thought the next day to ask the next must pay money, or go to work to find him. He was afraid that someone would make trouble for his wife. At about 6 o'clock in the morning, he set off again to the public security bureau and pleaded with the police to lock him up.

"No car, I'll walk. On the way to see the motorcycle soliciting, I asked him to take me to the Public Security Bureau. I went there, the guard said you should go to the police station, I said I went last night, now can I ask you to let me in to tell the situation to Interpol again. The guard said it had to go up one level at a time."

"Pass" in vain, he went to the bus platform, when 8:00, the next call, said he had to his work in the factory, Wu Zhe in 10:00 to get 50,000 out. He borrowed money from a friend. After the next family received it, he was asked to pay back the money in one day. "You can borrow money online if you don't have it. "

Wu Zhe was afraid, both afraid of meeting with the next conflict, but also afraid of being forced to borrow online. He climbed to the top of the factory, on the 6th floor, sent a message to his friends. The sudden pressure broke him, and he decided to commit suicide by jumping off the building.

Fortunately, his family stopped him in time, and he did not take this road. "My wife said that if it happened, she would wait for me even if I were in prison. " To be safe, Wu Zhe quit his job and took his wife away from the factory to live with relatives, "a life of flight. "

Indict

February 21, Wu Zhe's home to get a filing notice, the police informed that the swindler has fled abroad.

Said the amount of warm gun became empty promises, on the home or Wu Zhe, how also can not collect hundreds of thousands. The last told Wu Zhe, next, he works every month, if the salary has 5,000, he will return 4,000, if have 4,000 to 3,000. Wu Zhe with his two underlings negotiations, will be the upper house to earn money equally to them, the next do not agree, said will look for debt collection companies, will be prepared to sue.

Although in the view of Yan Shuangjin, a lawyer with Fujian Youtong Law Firm, Wu Zhe's conduct was not suspected of fraud: he was unable to deliver goods to the next home on time, and it was the performance of the first-hand seller, Tian Mou, that did not result in Wu Zhe's intention of illegally possessing the next home's money, but at this time Wu Zhe because the pressure is too big, sleep not well, the meal also can not eat. "Regret Ah, also lost the job. "

Sun Fei has also decided to sue.

Only the day before he reported the crime, Tai Ling first went to the police station to report the crime, said Sun Fei Suspected of fraud and money laundering. This complicates the case and requires a 30-day adjournment. During the month, he received phone calls from Tai Ling's husband and friends, one claiming to be a lawyer and the other claiming to be a debt collector, who kindly advised Sun Fei: "each take a step back, half the money back here, and you can buy a lesson. "

By contrast, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe is not so much known as the "down-and-out" as the "retail" , their experience is not unique. As of February 14, China had cracked 3,600 cases of fraud related to the epidemic and arrested 1,373 suspects with a total amount of 66.91 million yuan, according to official figures from the Ministry of Public Security. Those involved in the warm gun scam are also included.

In addition to the thousands of units ordered by Sun Fei and Wu Zhe, there are also many people who order a small amount of warm guns for the purpose of returning to work in factories and donating anti-epidemic materials. They are the underlings of the "inverted GRANDPA" and the "retail investors" .

Fang Zhiyuan is a native of Tongling, Anhui Province. On February 11, he was introduced by a friend to Chan Mou, who claimed to have a warm gun for delivery. Fang Zhiyuan needs a warming gun for his factory to resume work. In addition, there are also six or seven checkpoints in his hometown village for body temperature testing. He wants to donate some materials. In the early morning of the same day, he bought 77 warming guns from Chen somewhere, totaling 15,400 yuan, and arranged for delivery in the morning.

Invoice No. As promised, Chen said no spot, need to wait another eight or nine days. Fang Zhiyuan can not wait, ask to return money, be rejected however. In the chat, Chen repeatedly threatened, "you asked me to help sell you, no one tied you, you buy, you transfer money. " This let Fang Zhiyuan very do not understand, do business, "no diamond do not work. "

The day before Fang's transfer, Wang Juan in Beijing was helping two friends buy a batch of warm guns. After docking with the seller, the other side first promised to find goods the same day, and then changed their mouth, said only the industrial amount temperature gun, can also be used to measure body temperature, as soon as possible to get the source of payment. As an industrial temperature gun, it is generally believed that the error is larger without professional debugging.

Desperate for money, Wang Juan bought 131 warm guns at a unit price of 322 and transferred more than 40,000 in installments. Only in the end, she received the express order number is empty, when the request for a refund was also rejected.

February 21, Wu Zhe's home to get a filing notice, the police informed that the swindler has fled abroad.

Said the amount of warm gun became empty promises, on the home or Wu Zhe, how also can not collect hundreds of thousands. The last told Wu Zhe, next, he works every month, if the salary has 5,000, he will return 4,000, if have 4,000 to 3,000. Wu Zhe with his two underlings negotiations, will be the upper house to earn money equally to them, the next do not agree, said will look for debt collection companies, will be prepared to sue.

Although in the view of Yan Shuangjin, a lawyer with Fujian Youtong Law Firm, Wu Zhe's conduct was not suspected of fraud: he was unable to deliver goods to the next home on time, and it was the performance of the first-hand seller, Tian Mou, that did not result in Wu Zhe's intention of illegally possessing the next home's money, but at this time Wu Zhe because the pressure is too big, sleep not well, the meal also can not eat. "Regret Ah, also lost the job. "

Sun Fei has also decided to sue.

"

By contrast, Sun Fei and Wu Zhe is not so much known as the "down-and-out" as the "retail" , their experience is not unique. As of February 14, China had cracked 3,600 cases of fraud related to the epidemic and arrested 1,373 suspects with a total amount of 66.91 million yuan, according to official figures from the Ministry of Public Security. Those involved in the warm gun scam are also included.

They are the underlings of the "inverted GRANDPA" and the "retail investors" .

Fang Zhiyuan is a native of Tongling, Anhui Province. On February 11, he was introduced by a friend to Chan Mou, who claimed to have a warm gun for delivery. Fang Zhiyuan needs a warming gun for his factory to resume work. In addition, there are also six or seven checkpoints in his hometown village for body temperature testing. He wants to donate some materials. In the early morning of the same day, he bought 77 warming guns from Chen somewhere, totaling 15,400 yuan, and arranged for delivery in the morning.

Invoice No. As promised, Chen said no spot, need to wait another eight or nine days. Fang Zhiyuan can not wait, ask to return money, be rejected however. In the chat, Chen repeatedly threatened, "you asked me to help sell you, no one tied you, you buy, you transfer money. " This let Fang Zhiyuan very do not understand, do business, "no diamond do not work. "

The day before Fang's transfer, Wang Juan in Beijing was helping two friends buy a batch of warm guns. After docking with the seller, the other side first promised to find goods the same day, and then changed their mouth, said only the industrial amount temperature gun, can also be used to measure body temperature, as soon as possible to get the source of payment. As an industrial temperature gun, it is generally believed that the error is larger without professional debugging.

Desperate for money, Wang Juan bought 131 warm guns at a unit price of 322 and transferred more than 40,000 in installments. Only in the end, she received the express order number is empty, when the request for a refund was also rejected.

Demand

After the event, Sun Fei contacted a friend who had been in contact with the production of the Erwen gun and concluded, "now anyone who says they have more than 500(Erwen) guns in their hands is a liar and should not be trusted. "

The current scalping, is basically pre-received payment, and then through various channels to find goods, "even many are fraudulent money, " the thermometer supplier Jiuan Medical Chairman Liu Yi said. The first person to release the spot information, will through the nth power fission method, the accumulation of large amounts of money and needs, and finally because of the hands of no goods, has been delayed delivery date.

Liu thinks it is impossible for some merchants to claim they have tens of thousands of them in stock. Last year, less than 2 million units were sold, he said, and the country now needs 10 million units a month for public health and epidemic prevention. "The capacity of all the manufacturers in the market is now used for the government's public health needs and is basically zero inventory. "

The medical grade forehead warm gun belongs to the second class medical instrument, the production enterprise must have the medical instrument production license qualification. Today, for companies, the main difficulty in expanding production capacity comes from the pressure of the supply chain: The production of Ewen Gun involves more than 100 raw materials, affected by the epidemic, and now suppliers are short of materials, upstream raw material enterprises also have to face the embarrassment of insufficient capacity.

More importantly, for the production enterprises, commercial needs have been put on hold, to make every effort to safeguard public health needs first, especially the needs of Hubei epidemic areas.

The current epidemic, many medical enterprises to speed up the resumption of production of warm guns and other medical supplies. Photo / Jiuan medical's official Weibo

The forehead warm gun in epidemic draught, worth several times in a hurry. In the case of insufficient supply, cheater, "Flip" , and "retail" , several up and down constitute a seemingly tense prosperity of the trading chain, but, each entrant can not get away with it.

By April, Liu expects further capacity to be freed up as thermometer makers ramp up production. If there is no major change in the epidemic, the amount of thermometer in the domestic supply and demand may be balanced.

Before the end of the epidemic, the words "Ewen Gun! Spot! " "50,000 from order! " Continued to appear in the seller's circle of friends.

(at the request of the interviewees, Sun Fei, Tai Ling, Wu Zhe, Qian Yu, Fang Zhiyuan and Wang Juan were given pseudonyms.)

After the event, Sun Fei contacted a friend who had been in contact with the production of the Erwen gun and concluded, "now anyone who says they have more than 500(Erwen) guns in their hands is a liar and should not be trusted. "

The current scalping, is basically pre-received payment, and then through various channels to find goods, "even many are fraudulent money, " the thermometer supplier Jiuan Medical Chairman Liu Yi said.
